inclusion.criterion: haemodialysis 3 x week with urea reduction ratio greater or equal to 65% or KT/V ( K - dialyzer clearance of urea, t - dialysis time, V - volume of distribution of urea, approximately equal to patient's total body water) greater or equal to 1.2.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have received haemodialysis three times weekly for ≥12 weeks before screening and during the 4-week screening/baseline period.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eligible patients must have stable hemoglobin concentrations (stable is defined as ≤25% change in weekly dose of ESA over 8 weeks).
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Recruited patients must have undergone continuous maintenance intravenous conventional Epoetin alpha or beta therapy for ≥8 weeks before screening and during the screening/baseline.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients should have adequate iron status, defined as serum ferritin ≥100 μg/L and transferrin saturation ≥20%.
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: New York Heart Association (NYHA) class III or IV congestive heart failure
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled hypertension (defined as pre-dialysis diastolic blood pressure ≥105 mmHg or systolic BP≥ 160 mmHg during the screening period)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of uncontrolled hyperparathyroidism (defined as parathyroid hormone level >1000 pg/ml with no response to conventional treatment of hyperparathyroidism according to Kidney Disease Outcomes Quality Initiative (KDOQI) guide line during the 12 months prior to baseline)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Haematological, inflammatory or infectious conditions that might interfere with the erythropoietin response
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Received red blood cell transfusions within 12 weeks before screening or during the screening/baseline period.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: The likelihood of early withdrawal; or life expectancy of <12 months
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has vomiting, non-bloody diarrhea, abdominal pain, fever, chills and loss of appetite for the past 3 days. He ate a salad at a restaurant prior to his diarrhea onset.
